changes: Added mandatory verification checklist generation after Phase 1
Added Phase 1.5: Checklist Execution Loop - ensures ALL requirements are verified
Agent must now mark every checkbox before proceeding to report generation
Added explicit 'do not skip items because user didn't mention them' rule
Updated non-skippable checkpoints (now 7 checkpoints)
Phase 5 report must include complete checklist summary table
Report metadata now includes 'checklist_complete' field
MAJOR ARCHITECTURE CHANGE: Goal-driven requirements derivation
New knowledge_base/ directory with extensible biological system definitions
Systems are defined by: Goal → Proteins → mRNAs → Cis-elements (Central Dogma)
Agent derives requirements dynamically from knowledge base, not static checklists
BLAST-first approach: identify gross anatomy before looking for specific elements
Element verification by homology alignment, not just motif search
Explicit acceptance criteria (85% identity minimum for VERIFIED status)
Structural rule validation (e.g., AAP in +1 frame, VP1/2/3 nested)
Construct type classification (Rep-Cap helper vs transfer plasmid vs etc.)
Extensible: add new biological systems by creating new JSON in knowledge_base/systems/
Added mandatory ground-truth verification against external databases
Added verification_sources.json
Pre-Flight Reports include verification status
Added plasmid type classification
Added context-aware cis-element detection
Added persistent Pre-Flight Report generation
Initial release
